it.cnr.isti.hpc.dexter.relatedness

Class Relatedness

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.cnr.isti.hpc.dexter.relatedness.Relatedness
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Relatedness>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MilneRelatedness, MilneRelatedness2

    public abstract class Relatedness
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Relatedness>
    Contains the relatedness between two entities, and several functions on the graph useful to implement a relatedness function.
    Author:
    Diego Ceccarelli Created on Oct 10, 2012
